nodes.text: The Monocycle was a wheel bike produced by Koensayr Manufacturing during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Koensayr Monocycle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on May 4, 2015 as part of the Core Worlds and Deep Core Explorer's Packs.
The real-life counterpart to the Monocycle is the monowheel.
